subsection.name: Optionally, checkout the source code and build the plugin
subsection.p: The demo project depends on the latest snapshot (trunk) of the plugin. So you can either set the version in your demo to the latest release or build the plugin locally. For the latter, check out the trunk source code from the SVN repository:

subsection.name: Check out, build and run the demo project
subsection.p: Check out the trunk source code from the SVN repository:
If you didn't build the plugin locally, set the correct release version in the root pom.
Build and run the demo project:
subsection.source: $ cd relateddocs-demo-trunk $ mvn clean install $ mvn -P cargo.run
